neutral.description: Flat and neutral tone with no emotional inflection.

gentleness.description: Soft and approachable tone, with a comforting aesthetic.

sadness.description: Delicate, nostalgic impression; expressive of emotional distance.

playfulness.description: Innocent and energetic tone, great for light and casual messages.

irony.description: Monospaced, dry and emotionless. Slightly cold or sarcastic vibe.

anxiety.description: A bit tense and restrained; captures hesitation and inner turmoil.

anger.description: Firm and assertive tone, suggests emotional impact or frustration.
